name: Echoes of the Ethereal
description:
The daughter of the noble Frigidaque family has been kidnapped, and a ransom demanded: a valuable heirloom to be delivered by the family scion himself, Hiemantis. Not being a complete and total fool, Hiemantis hires two of the Guild's foremost mercenaries to escort him to the exchange, but none of them could have been prepared for where this adventure would lead them.

Echoes of the Ethereal is a character-driven, fantasy RPG, with what is currently about an hour's worth of content. Join Hiemantis, Pratus, and Cora as they venture forth to deliver a ransom and find more than they expected.

FEATURES:

  • Random encounters!
  • A dog that makes a barking noise when you interact with it!
  • Elements! Elements just all up ins here!
  • Siblings acting like siblings!
  • People who aren't even related acting like siblings!
  • The word bastard used both literally and metaphorically!
  • Maybe don't play this with the kids unless you're ready for that conversation!
  • Mostly wholesome otherwise, though!
  • Exclamation points!!!
